title: Perl for Beginners
description: 20-step quest sequence for learning Perl fundamentals.

challenges.title: Hello, Perl
challenges.summary: Write your first Perl script and print a friendly message.
challenges.prompt: Create a Perl script that prints "Hello, Perl!" followed by your name.
acceptance_criteria: Output includes "Hello, Perl!" and a name
hints: Remember to end statements with semicolons

challenges.title: Variables and Strings
challenges.summary: Use variables to build and print a sentence.
challenges.prompt: Store your favorite language in a variable and print a sentence using interpolation.
acceptance_criteria: Printed sentence includes the variable value

challenges.title: User Input
challenges.summary: Read a line of input and respond.
challenges.prompt: Ask for a user's name, read input, and greet them by name.

challenges.title: Basic Math
challenges.summary: Perform arithmetic operations and print results.
challenges.prompt: Given two numbers, print their sum, difference, product, and quotient.
acceptance_criteria: Handles division safely when the second number is non-zero
hints: Consider checking for zero before division

challenges.title: Conditional Logic
challenges.summary: Decide which message to show based on user input.
challenges.prompt: Ask for a number and print whether it is negative, zero, or positive.
acceptance_criteria: Correctly identifies negative, zero, or positive
hints: Use numeric comparison operators like < and >
Handle zero in its own branch

challenges.title: Loops 101
challenges.summary: Use a loop to repeat an action.
challenges.prompt: Print the numbers from 1 to 10, each on a new line.
hints: print each number with a newline

challenges.title: While Loop Practice
challenges.summary: Keep looping until a condition is met.
challenges.prompt: Keep asking the user for a password until they enter "open-sesame".
acceptance_criteria: Stops when the exact password is entered
hints: Use a while loop with a condition

challenges.title: Arrays and Indexing
challenges.summary: Store and access multiple values.
challenges.prompt: Create an array of five favorite foods and print the first and last items.

challenges.title: Array Iteration
challenges.summary: Process each element in an array.
challenges.prompt: Given an array of numbers, print each number and its square.
acceptance_criteria: Prints number and square for each item

challenges.title: Hashes (Dictionaries)
challenges.summary: Store key-value pairs and access them.
challenges.prompt: Create a hash of three countries and their capitals, then print each pair.
acceptance_criteria: Outputs each country with its capital

challenges.title: Subroutines
challenges.summary: Write and call a reusable function.
challenges.prompt: Write a subroutine that takes two numbers and returns the larger one.
hints: Use return to send back a value

challenges.title: File Reading Basics
challenges.summary: Open and read a file line by line.
challenges.prompt: Read a text file and print each line with its line number.
acceptance_criteria: Prints each line prefixed with a number
hints: Increment a counter inside the loop

challenges.title: File Writing
challenges.summary: Create a new file and write content to it.
challenges.prompt: Ask for three notes from the user and write them to a file, one per line.

challenges.title: Simple Regex Search
challenges.summary: Find matches in a string using regex.
challenges.prompt: Given a sentence, count how many words start with the letter 's' or 'S'.
acceptance_criteria: Counts words starting with s or S
hints: Add the i flag for case-insensitive matches

challenges.title: Mini Log Parser
challenges.summary: Extract structured data from log lines.
challenges.prompt: Parse a log file where each line is "LEVEL: message" and count how many of each level occurs.
acceptance_criteria: Reads the file line by line
Prints a summary for each level
hints: Capture the level with a regex group
Use a hash to track counts

challenges.title: Command-Line Arguments
challenges.summary: Make your script respond to CLI arguments.
challenges.prompt: Create a script that takes a word from the command line and prints it reversed.

challenges.title: Debugging a Broken Script
challenges.summary: Fix bugs in a provided script so it works.
challenges.prompt: Given a script that tries to sum numbers from a file but fails, identify and fix the errors so it outputs the correct sum.
hints: Ensure variables are declared and initialized

challenges.title: Data Transformation
challenges.summary: Transform input data into a new format.
challenges.prompt: Read a CSV of "name,score" pairs and output a sorted list of names by highest score.
hints: Use sort with a custom comparator

challenges.title: Mini CLI Tool
challenges.summary: Build a small utility with multiple commands.
challenges.prompt: Create a CLI tool with commands: add, multiply, and help. Usage: script.pl add 2 3.

challenges.title: Refactor for Clarity
challenges.summary: Clean up an existing script to improve readability and structure.
challenges.prompt: Refactor a monolithic script that validates emails into small, named subroutines without changing behavior.
acceptance_criteria: Logic is split into smaller subroutines
